T02D2047:147b-1: rakta ya m'a ri aa ba li s'a dha nam tsinta ma ni n'a ma /
T02D2047:147b-3: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i las kyi phred ba'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba /
T02D2047:147b-4: gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2047:147b-5: lha dang lha min ma lus cod pan gyis btud pa'i //
T02D2047:147b-6: zhabs kyi padma dang ldan 'jam dbyangs rdo rje dang //
T02D2047:147b-7: de nyid rang bzhin khro bo gshin rje gshed po la //
T02D2047:147b-8: btud nas de yi sgrub thabs gsal bar bri //
T02D2047:147b-10: dam pa'i shes gnyen rnyed dka' bas //
T02D2047:147b-11: 'dod pa ma lus bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2047:147b-12: sngags pas 'bad pas mkhas pas kye //
T02D2047:147b-13: re zhig 'gro ba ma lus par gdon par bya
T02D2047:147b-14: ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa
T02D2047:147b-15: dang / dad pa mchog dang ldan pa /
T02D2047:147b-17: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa
T02D2047:147b-18: so sor rtogs par dang ldan pa cig gi gshin
T02D2047:147b-19: rje gshed dmar po'i bzlas pa bya ba sngon du
T02D2047:147b-20: 'gro bas sam / lha'i rjes su gnang ba thob
T02D2047:147b-21: pas gnod spyin mo la sogs pa'i dngos grub bam
T02D2047:147b-22: 'gro bas sam / / sems la 'dod pa gang
T02D2047:147b-23: yin pa bsam gtan la gnas pas bsgrub par bya'o
T02D2047:147b-24: 'gro bas sam / / // de skad du yang gsungs pa ni //
T02D2047:147b-25: sngags dang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor dang //
T02D2047:147b-28: rnam pa gzhan gyis mi 'grub bo //
T02D2047:148a-1: nags tshal dben pa dag tu ni //
T02D2047:148a-2: yang na sangs 'di tha mas cad kyis //
T02D2047:148a-3: sngags pa rnams kyis bye ba bzlas //
T02D2047:148a-4: las ni thams cad byed par gsungs //
T02D2047:148a-5: gang zhig phun sum tshogs pa yin //
T02D2047:148a-6: bya ba thams cad 'dod pa des //
T02D2047:148a-7: nyon mongs dri ma thams cad dag / zla ba lta bur sems tsam nyid //
T02D2047:148a-8: bdag kyang de yi rang bzhin no //
T02D2047:148a-9: snod dang bcud kyi 'gro ba dang //
T02D2047:148a-10: sems tsam nyid du sems can kun //
T02D2047:148a-11: yang dag sangs rgyas de sras rnams //
T02D2047:148a-12: bdag gi sems su gnyis med bya //
T02D2047:148a-13: de yi 'od zer lcags kyu yis //
T02D2047:148a-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan ni //
T02D2047:148a-15: sa dang pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02D2047:148a-16: nam mkha' lta bur bsgom par bya //
T02D2047:148a-17: dkar po'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pa ni //
T02D2047:148a-19: rang sems de ltar bsgoms pa las //
T02D2047:148a-20: sngon gyi som lam stobs kyis ni //
T02D2047:148a-21: snying rjes bskul nas 'di lta ste //
T02D2047:148a-22: sa 'og bar du bsgom par bya //
T02D2047:148a-23: ae ma sems can sdug bsngal can //
T02D2047:148a-24: 'khor bar yun du gnas pa dang /
T02D2047:148a-25: thabs dang shes rab bral ba yis //
T02D2047:148a-26: yang dang yang du yun ring gnas //
T02D2047:148a-27: de rnams kun gyis rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02D2047:148a-28: bdag nyid gshin rje gshed por bsgom //
T02D2047:148a-29: aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi /
T02D2047:148a-31: de las byung ba'i 'od zer ldan //
T02D2047:148a-32: ka la sogs pa'i yi ges brgyan //
T02D2047:148a-33: rim gyis skyes pa'i sems nyid ni //
T02D2047:148a-34: sems can yongs su 'dzin par byed //
T02D2047:148a-35: kun kyang snying rje'i stobs las byung /
T02D2047:148a-37: // / gnod spyin mo la sogs pa'i sgrub ba gang la yang khrus kyi cho ga bstan pa /
T02D2047:148a-38: de la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02D2047:148a-40: thog ma nas ma skyes pa /
T02D2047:148a-41: rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa /
T02D2047:148a-42: thog ma nas zhi ba'i chos thams cad la sogs
T02D2047:148a-43: pa lhag mar mos pas bdag gi lus dang phyi
T02D2047:148a-44: dang nang thams cad rdul phra rab kyi rnam par
T02D2047:148a-45: dbye bar bya ba'i mi dmigs pa'i spyod pas myur
T02D2047:148a-47: nang gi khrus chen po la nan tan du bya'o //
T02D2047:148a-48: gang zhig phyi'i rjas la chags pa rmongs pa'i blo
T02D2047:148a-49: can rnam par rtog pa'i dpyod pas the tshom sel
T02D2047:148b-0: bar mi nus pa des phyi'i khrus kyi @148b cho
T02D2047:148b-1: ga 'di bya'o // thog mar re zhig h'um yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D2047:148b-2: khro bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D2047:148b-3: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa khro gnyer dang bcas pa /
T02D2047:148b-4: sku mdog sngon po 'bar ba chen po'i 'od zer 'khrug pa /
T02D2047:148b-5: dang po'i rdo rje 'gying pa nga rgyal dang bcas
T02D2047:148b-6: pa rdo rje chen po 'od zer 'bar ba'i me
T02D2047:148b-7: stag 'phro ba / dang bor rdo rje gsor zhing bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba ltar 'bar ba /
T02D2047:148b-8: rdo rje nyi ma me 'bar bar bdag nyid sprul nas /
T02D2047:148b-9: aom h'um pi dhu pi k'a ya dhu pi pra dzva li ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2047:148b-11: rdo rje bsngams pas nang du bstan te /
T02D2047:148b-12: bar dang bcas pa mthe bo rdo rje rtse sprad
T02D2047:148b-13: nas phyir gyed pas rdo rje me'i dam tshig phyag
T02D2047:148b-14: rgya bcings nas bdag nyid 'bar bar bya'o //
T02D2047:148b-15: rdo rje 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas bzod par dka' ba'o //
T02D2047:148b-16: de'i rjes su bskyed rim che bar bstan pa bzhin du rdo rje go cha ste /
T02D2047:148b-17: de'i rjes su aom bhur dzva la aom h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2047:148b-19: cha gsum du byas la sangs 'dis byin gyis brlabs nas khrus byed pa'i sar bzhag ste /
T02D2047:148b-20: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya bcings la
T02D2047:148b-21: chu'am chu'i snod gnas la bgegs thams cad bskrad pa'i
T02D2047:148b-22: ched du 'og dang steng bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2047:148b-23: aom bhu dzva li sva h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2047:148b-25: gong du bshad pa'i sa cha gsum po las cha gcig gis bshang lam bkrus te /
T02D2047:148b-26: lag pa gnyis bkrus la nye rag bya'o //
T02D2047:148b-27: cha gnyis la h'um zhes brjod cing lus po thams
T02D2047:148b-28: cad khrus byas te cha gsum pas mgo bkrus nas
T02D2047:148b-29: / aom bum dzva la h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2047:148b-30: zhes pa 'dis nye bar reg nas rang gi mgo la sngags dang bcas pa'i chu gtor nas //
T02D2047:148b-31: rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag byin
T02D2047:148b-32: gyis brlabs nas khrus byed sa nas ldang bar byed
T02D2047:148b-33: do // de'i rjes la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sangs bzlas pa'i chus gos la gtor nas /
T02D2047:148b-34: ji lta ba bzhin gyon nas yi ge brgya pa brjod cing /
T02D2047:148b-35: yid kyis chu'i gnas kyi srung ma gshegs nas /
T02D2047:148b-36: skad cig gis lha'i nga rgyal gyis de'i sngags yid
T02D2047:148b-37: kyis brjod cing bsam gtan gyi khang pa'i drung du
T02D2047:148b-38: 'gro bar bya // de nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus la rig ma des nye bar reg la /
T02D2047:149a-1: ces pa lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bgegs tham cad bskrad nas /
T02D2047:149a-2: bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs te /
T02D2047:149a-3: yang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis stan la sogs
T02D2047:149a-4: pa dang bsam gtan gyi khang pa la byung pa
T02D2047:149a-5: la sogs pa gtor nas nye bar reg par bya'o
T02D2047:149a-6: // sam ya stva zhes brjod cing phyag g-yas bkan par byas la /
T02D2047:149a-7: gung mo dang srin lag tsam bkug nas /
T02D2047:149a-8: phyag rgya 'dis rkang pa gnyis kyi nang du bcug la /
T02D2047:149a-9: cog bur bsdad de smra ba bcad la /
T02D2047:149a-10: padma'i tshul gyis kha la yang yang reg par byas /
T02D2047:149a-11: lan gnyis sam lan gsum du rna ba gnyis dang
T02D2047:149a-12: mig gnyis dang sna dang kha dang lag pa gnyis
T02D2047:149a-13: dang / lte ba dang mgo la reg par bya ba ni mgo bkur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2047:149a-14: de ltar khrus byas pa 'am ma byas kyang rung /
T02D2047:149a-15: ri'i sul la sogs pa dben pa'i gnas su chags
T02D2047:149a-16: pa thams cad dang bral bas spyod lam yangs par
T02D2047:149a-17: ngag bcad la / 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi
T02D2047:149a-18: rnal 'byor gyis gnod spyin mo'i sgrub par nye bar
T02D2047:149a-19: ngag bcad la / bya ste / de la h'm
T02D2047:149a-20: gi ges 'gro ba thams cad stong par byas la
T02D2047:149a-21: ngag bcad la / bya ste / / bi ma lo dhe dhi dh'um zhes pa brjod pas /
T02D2047:149a-22: rgya mtsho chen po'i steng du aom aa pa tsa la bi re sv'a h'a /
T02D2047:149a-23: zhes pas gser gyi rang bzhin gyi steng aom aa
T02D2047:149a-24: pa tsa la h'um zhes pas rin po che'i rang
T02D2047:149a-25: bzhin gyi ri'i rgyal po tshad med pa /
T02D2047:149a-26: me tog dang shing thog sna tshogs pa dang nags tshal gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2047:149a-27: dpag bsam gyi shing gis brgyan pa /
T02D2047:149a-28: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod dang ldan pa yid du 'ong bar bsgoms te /
T02D2047:149a-29: der hr'i:'i yi ge las padma /
T02D2047:149a-30: de'i steng du a'a li dang po aa yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2047:149a-31: de'i steng du kshim rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2047:149a-32: de'i sgra dang 'od zer gyi sprin gyi tshogs kyis nam mkha' thams cad khyab par bsam /
T02D2047:149a-33: 'od zer de dag gnod spyin mo'i gzugs su gyur
T02D2047:149a-34: te tshur 'dus nas kshim de nyid la thim par
T02D2047:149a-35: gyur / kshim de nyid yongs su gyur pa las
T02D2047:149a-36: gnod spyin mo longs spyod can ma zhes bya ba
T02D2047:149a-37: lang tsho rgyas pa sgeg pa'i ro dang ldan pa
T02D2047:149a-38: gyur / / mdzes ma lha mo'i gzugs lta bu 'dzin pa /
T02D2047:149a-39: sku mdog ljang gu gos dkar pos smad g-yogs dang stod g-yogs byas pa /
T02D2047:149b-0: phyag g-yon @149b ba dpag bsam gyi shing la 'jug pa /
T02D2047:149b-1: phyag g-yas pa me tog kha dog lnga dang ldan pas brgyan pa /
T02D2047:149b-2: steng na gdugs dkar po rang bzhin gyis gnas pa /
T02D2047:149b-3: 'gying ba'i tshul gyis 'gying zhing g-yo ba med pa de ltar rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2047:149b-4: de nas gong du bstan pa'i sangs dang phyag rgya
T02D2047:149b-5: des byin gyis brlabs te kha lta bu'i phyag rgya
T02D2047:149b-6: bcings te / aom ya m'anta ka h'um zhes pas
T02D2047:149b-7: rang gi thugs ka nas gshin rje'i gshed gong du
T02D2047:149b-8: bstan pa'i gzugs can rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa
T02D2047:149b-9: bcings te / / sku las 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba /
T02D2047:149b-10: nyi ma byed ba lta bu dang ldan pa /
T02D2047:149b-11: bgegs ma lus pa 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D2047:149b-12: 'jig rten gsum po bsdigs par byed pa'i khro bo cig spros la /
T02D2047:149b-13: de la bka' bsgo ba byas pas gnod spyin mo bkug nas /
T02D2047:149b-14: bdag gi sku la zhugs nas slar phyir spros te
T02D2047:149b-15: gnod spyin mo'i mgo bdag gi zhabs kyis mnan nas
T02D2047:149b-17: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la
T02D2047:149b-18: sogs pa dang mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa sngon
T02D2047:149b-19: du 'gro bas / gong bzhin du gdan dang mchod yon dbul ba dang /
T02D2047:149b-20: mtheb mdzub gnyis skam pa ltar byas la sor mo
T02D2047:149b-21: gzhan rnams phyir bskyed de zhabs bsil gyi sngags kyis
T02D2047:149b-22: zhabs bsil phul la dam tshig ma'i phyag rgya bstan
T02D2047:149b-23: te / rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya gong du bstan to //
T02D2047:149b-24: 'dir dam tshig ma la ni lag pa gnyis kyi
T02D2047:149b-25: sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol te srin lag gnyis
T02D2047:149b-26: phyir bskyed la tshigs gsum pa bkug ste phye ba
T02D2047:149b-27: 'di ni gnod spyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig
T02D2047:149b-28: gi phyag rgya'o // aom bha ga wa ti dri shya ho //
T02D2047:149b-29: de bzhin du lha mo rang rang gi rtog pa
T02D2047:149b-30: nas byung ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sngags gzung bar
T02D2047:149b-31: bya'o // de nas aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa
T02D2047:149b-32: zhes dbang bskur bar bya ste phyag rgya gong du
T02D2047:149b-33: bya'o // bstan zin to // de nas mchod yon lngas mchod do //
T02D2047:149b-34: aom gyi yi ge las byung ba'i me tog dang /
T02D2047:149b-41: rag dung la sogs pa'i sgra'i bye brag dang /
T02D2047:150a-13: ji lta ba bzhin du gnas la yod pa dang /
T02D2047:150a-14: gzhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs mthong ba dang thos pa
T02D2047:150a-15: la sogs pas nam mkha' khyab par khengs pas mchog
T02D2047:150a-16: spyin mo la mchod pa byas par bsam /
T02D2047:150a-17: de nas gong bzhin du dril bu dkrol zhing byin
T02D2047:150a-18: rlabs kyi phyag rgyas mchod pa byin gyis brlabs te
T02D2047:150a-19: / gong bzhin du gnod spyin mo'i rin po che'i ri la gnas la /
T02D2047:150a-20: sgrub pa'i dbang du gyur pa /
T02D2047:150a-21: rang gi gzugs kyi sprin gyis nam mkha' gang par
T02D2047:150a-22: byed pa de nyid thun gsum mam bzhir bsgoms pas
T02D2047:150a-24: gang zhig bsgom pas 'grub par mi nus pa des
T02D2047:150a-25: rtog pa las bshad pa'i sangs bzhin du bzlas par
T02D2047:150a-27: aom bha ga wa te sv'a h'a /
T02D2047:150a-30: mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga byas la //
T02D2047:150a-31: gnod spyin mo'i sngags rang gi snying las bskyed /
T02D2047:150a-32: rang gi sngags gnod spyin mo'i snying la thun gsum mam bzhi'i rim pas bzlas pa bya /
T02D2047:150a-33: ngal na yang dag par mchod de yi ge brgya ba brjod la ;
T02D2047:150a-35: zhes pa phyag rgyal sogs dgrol ba'i bsam pas dam
T02D2047:150a-36: tshig gi phyag rgya kha steng du bstan pas dgrol
T02D2047:150a-37: lo // de kho na ltar nyi ma re res
T02D2047:150a-38: yi ge'i grangs kyi 'bum yongs su rdzogs par byas
T02D2047:150a-39: la 'phags pa gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyis
T02D2047:150a-40: gos sar pa mis ma gyon pa 'am shing leb
T02D2047:150a-41: bam gang yang rung ba skye bos dben pa yid
T02D2047:150a-43: bla re dgram pa dang gdugs la sogs pa dang /
T02D2047:150a-44: me tog dri zhim po dang bdug spos dang mar
T02D2047:150a-45: me la gos pas nye bar brgyan pa dang sa
T02D2047:150a-46: bzhi la dri'i byug pa byas pa'i steng du bzhag
T02D2047:150a-47: ste / gnod spyin mo gong du bstan pa'i gzugs su sprul nas /
T02D2047:150a-48: dgug ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas 'phags
T02D2047:150a-49: pa gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya sngon du bsams
T02D2047:150a-50: te / rjes la ji ltar bde bas rang gis
T02D2047:150a-51: bri ba'i ri mo mkhan la gshin rje'i gshed kyi
T02D2047:150b-0: rnal 'byor gyi srung ba @150b byas la //
T02D2047:150b-1: de lta bu'i thang ka la skye bos dben pa 'am /
T02D2047:150b-2: tshal du rab gnas byas la ;
T02D2047:150b-3: nya la dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang mar me
T02D2047:150b-4: bzhi phul nas gong du bstan pa'i tshogs thams cad
T02D2047:150b-5: la byin gyis brlabs nas mchod pa chen po byas
T02D2047:150b-6: te // dung la sogs pa'i mchod yon gyi snod
T02D2047:150b-7: la me tog dkar po dri zhim po'i chu la
T02D2047:150b-8: bsres pas gang bar byas la lag pas snod la
T02D2047:150b-9: reg la dgongs mo nas brtsams smyung gnas byas la
T02D2047:150b-10: de srid bar du bzlas pa byas /
T02D2047:150b-11: ji srid bar du logs spyod spyin byed ma lha
T02D2047:150b-12: mo'i gzugs lta bu longs spyod can ma 'ongs nas
T02D2047:150b-13: bdag nyid kyi lag pa gnyis nas 'dzin te byung
T02D2047:150b-14: na mig mi blta bar bya'o //
T02D2047:150b-15: gal te bltas na sgrub pa po nyid rengs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2047:150b-16: mtshams bcad pa ni dra ba dang /
T02D2047:150b-19: khyed bde bar spyon la sogs par byas la /
T02D2047:150b-20: bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi phyag rgyas mchod yon phul la
T02D2047:150b-21: snyim pa sbyar la mthe bod gnyis rtser bzhag la
T02D2047:150b-22: mchod yon dbul ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas /
T02D2047:150b-23: aom sarba de ba t'a tsintya mri ta dh'a ra sv'a h'a /
T02D2047:150b-25: de nas mchod pa byas la /
T02D2047:150b-26: dri dang me tog dang spos la sogs pa yang
T02D2047:150b-27: mchod yon phul nas snyim pa kha phye la chu
T02D2047:150b-29: de'i nang mthe bong gnyis bcug la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mthe bong mnan par byas te /
T02D2047:150b-30: srin lag gnyis rtse sprad nas gung mo gnyis phyir
T02D2047:150b-31: bskyed par bya ba ni zhi ba'i gtor ma'i phyag
T02D2047:150b-32: rgya'o // aom hi hi tu ru tu ru sam
T02D2047:150b-33: pu ra ya ma h'a pa ya na h'um h'um
T02D2047:150b-34: rgya'o // phat sv'a h'a / aa mri ta dh'a ra sv'a h'a /
T02D2047:150b-37: khyed kyi bdag gis ci bgyi zhes zer na /
T02D2047:150b-38: de'i tshe gong du gang 'dod pa de nyid blang par bya'i gzhan ni mi smra'o //
T02D2047:150b-40: zhes pa'i sangs 'di snying po phyag rgya dang bcas pas mchog blangs pa de lta'i bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2047:150b-41: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong phyir bskyed la bstan pa snying gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2047:150b-42: 'og tu kha blta na mchog blang bar bya'o //
T02D2047:150b-43: de ni sgrub pa pos aa ma nyid du blangs na bu lta bur skyong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2047:150b-44: grub thob dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2047:151a-0: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang lhan cig @151a * //
T02D2047:151a-2: shing thog kyang ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2047:151a-3: sgrub pa po gang gis zos pa de tshe bskal pa tsam du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2047:151a-4: srin mo gyis shig ces brjod na 'dis nor bcu gnyis ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2047:151a-5: sgrub pa po 'khor bcu gcig dang bcas pa la
T02D2047:151a-6: kha zas bsgrim pa med par ster bar 'gyur ro
T02D2047:151a-8: pho nya mo byas na dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol
T02D2047:151a-9: nas kyang skyes pa'am bud med gang 'dod pa khugs
T02D2047:151a-10: par 'gyur ro // gong du bstan pa'i aa ma'i don yang byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2047:151a-11: yang na khyim thab mar gyur pas ri rab la
T02D2047:151a-12: sogs pa la nye bar gnas pa'i brtul zhugs can
T02D2047:151a-14: rig 'dzin grub pa rnams kyi tshe bskal pa'i bar
T02D2047:151a-15: du thub par bya ba'i ro bro ba'i shing thog
T02D2047:151a-16: rnams ster zhing zhes pa la sogs pa rtogs par
T02D2047:151a-17: bya'o // gang zhig gnod spyin mo rtog pa las
T02D2047:151a-18: bshad pa'i dus la 'gal nas 'ong bar ma gyur
T02D2047:151a-19: bya'o // na / de'i tshe rdo rje lcags sgrog
T02D2047:151a-20: gi phyag rgyas gnod spyin mo de dus la ma
T02D2047:151a-21: bab bar du bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2047:151a-22: aom badzra spho ta h'um bam zhes pa'i phyag rgya gong du bstan zin to //
T02D2047:151a-23: gal te ci yang mi smra na //
T02D2047:151a-24: de'i tshe rdo rje bzhad ma'i phyag rgyas smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2047:151a-25: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D2047:151a-26: na mo badzra p'a nis pa la ha se ha sa badzra ni ku ru ku ru /
T02D2047:151a-27: kam pa kam pa tsa la tsa la kalpa kalpa sv'a h'a /
T02D2047:151a-29: dngos gra ma byin par 'gro bar 'gyur na de nyid kyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2047:151a-30: phyag rgya ni thal mo sbyar nas srin lag gnyis
T02D2047:151a-31: nang du bsnol te mthe bong gnyis kyis srin lag
T02D2047:151a-32: gnyis kyi rtsa ba mnan par byas /
T02D2047:151a-33: gung mo gnyis rtse sprad nas de'i rtsa ru mdzub
T02D2047:151a-34: mo gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par rtse sprad de gzhag
T02D2047:151a-35: / mthe chung gnyis bsnol te phyir bskyed par bya
T02D2047:151a-36: zhes so // 'byung po thams cad la chu la bzlas la brjod par bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2047:151a-37: gnod spyin mo dag / aa pa r'a dzi ta dang /
T02D2047:151a-38: gzhan yang yi dvags mo la sogs pa'i cho ga
T02D2047:151a-39: 'di ni ji ltar sbyor ba ji lta bar sbyar
